responseText: NSLOCTEXT("[70199B914E7E03A9706A1499CF20B1FD]", "2D018BF149196904973CF6BC63CA8AD0", "[The Ashen Pyre\'s have a spiritual connection with the benevolent god of life, Kyronu. If this rite is not performed, a purifier soul will become a corrupt puppet of evil, cursed to never know death nor life. Only through the Rite of Kyronic Ashes can we Honor the Brave.]")
name: CSQ_DD_0081_COW_PurifiersGuide_16
